features: Neutralize Odor with Aromatic Luxury — Transform your living space into an oasis of relaxation and comfort with this aromatherapeutic odor neutralizer spray infused with essential oils. Eliminate unpleasant smells caused by cooking, smoke, pets, or other common household odors, and replace them with this elegant room freshener scent. Evoke a sense of sophistication from the moment you step inside your house with this deodorizing essential oil spray

Multi-Purpose Household Use — Combat strong odors while gently scenting your home with this home and fabric odor eliminator spray. Apply this air freshener spray for bathroom, bedroom, kitchen and the rest of your home. Use it as a furniture spray deodorizer for fabric, carpets and upholstery to instantly neutralize unpleasant smells. Made in the USA and cruelty-free, these long-lasting deodorizers for home are safe to use on any surface without leaving residue

Combat Smells with Proprietary Technology — Designed with our proprietary Muse Clear technology, this formula does more than just mask odors. It bonds with and neutralizes malodor molecules, rendering them permanently undetectable. Its reactive fragrant ingredients assist in the complete neutralization of odors without disturbing air quality. Tested by an independent laboratory against leading air freshener brands and proven more effective in malodor elimination

Set the Ambience for Revitalization — Relax in a light and airy atmosphere with the sophisticated aromatic effects of Fresh Linen essential oil room spray. Enjoy the delightful combination of floral and herbal notes, designed to evoke the scent of freshly laundered sheets. The room spray air freshener and deodorizer's blend of lavender, geranium, and jasmine creates a living space that not only looks beautiful, but also smells divine

An Inviting Living Space for All — Enhance the beauty and comfort of your residence with this home and bathroom spray odor eliminator. With just a few spritzes, this kitchen and bedroom spray creates an odor-free environment that is also beautifully fragranced. Elevate your cleaning ritual with this odor eliminating room spray, and entertain guests and host parties with confidence with the multi-purpose room deodorizer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean fresh smell
reviews.reviewText: Definitely not overpowering. It's a light airy scent that freshens up the whole house with just a few sprays. It's perfect. Will definitely be ordering again! Love love love

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I love this fragrance and it eliminates odor instead of mixing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Room Spray!
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I came across this product! I have been looking for something to freshen up my home without being too strong. This is a really nice and subtle scent that does exactly what I was looking for. I have tried Hearth and Hand, Casaluna, Febreeze, and Threshold brands and this one is my favorite by far. I am not sure how to describe the scent but it is nice and gentle. I highly recommend trying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works, but not as effective as others
reviews.reviewText: This product says what it claims to do, which is neutralizing odors. The cons are that it’s not a continuous mist, it takes more pumps that you would think, and the fragrance is very lemon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love! Natural essential oils!
reviews.reviewText: Smells wonderful and is safe to spray everywhere. No staining or discoloration on textiles or carpet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smell doesn’t last
reviews.reviewText: Smells good and I like that it’s natural, but the smell doesn’t last. You can spray it, leave the room, turn right around and come back and already the smell is gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing and non toxic
reviews.reviewText: The scent is just amazing. I honestly wish the bottle was way bigger than it was but for the quality of the ingredients in the smell it well over worth it. I also got the pillow spray as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon package I received this spray in with one other item had a leather tear in it. When I opened up the cap of to attach the spray bottle lid, the seal was broken open. I don’t trust this product although it smells good.
